function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Panic buying behavior during crises","Impact":"Shortages of essential supplies and exacerbation of public health risks","Mitigation":"Implementing measures to control and regulate panic buying, and increasing stockpiles of essential supplies","Technologies":"Supply chain management systems, regulatory measures, and communication technologies","People":"General public","Owner":"Government, retailers, and supply chain operators"},{"Description":"Inadequate disaster response planning","Impact":"Decreased preparedness and effectiveness in responding to crises","Mitigation":"Updating disaster response plans to reflect current challenges and decentralizing emergency responses","Technologies":"Disaster management systems, communication technologies, and decentralized coordination platforms","People":"Civil defense organizations, disaster response authorities","Owner":"Government agencies, NGOs, and community organizations"}]}
